ohuge prakashayath samagama , udasana ma kala wirakriyawe prathipala bukthiwindime subha mohotha elambaa athi bawa mata watahini.udasana siduwu siduwimen pasu paya kihipayak kisindu kalambaimakin thorawa gathawi thibu nisa ma sithuwe kathawa sukhanthayak wanu athi bawayi.mithrayage prakashayen pasu, ma sita aththe abhyantharayen lodiya kakarena yamahalak matha bawa mata pasak wiya.panthiye siyalu denama widuhalpathi karyalaya idiripitata kandawana lesa nayakayata upades labi thibuni.miniththu kihipayakin pasu apa siyalloma sitiye widuhalpathi karyalaya idiripasa pela gaswaya.thawath guruwarun kihipa deneku samaga idiriyata pamini widuhalpathiwaraya "motha" kawdayi wimasana ladi.ma hata idiriyata thabannata haki wuye ek piyawarak pamani.idiriyata pamini widuhalpathiwaraya athulu anek guruwaru thidena mahata digata harayata athin payin pahara dennata wiya.kisidu prashna kirimak nowini.sidu uuye amanushika pahara dimak pamani.
